title: What did Billie Eilish say at her concert? - Quora

response.answer_text: "Bad Guy" singer Billie Eilish called out body-shamers during an interlude at her Miami concert on Monday... If I shed the layers, I'm a slut," Eilish said in a voiceover. Elsewhere in the video, Eilish spoke to her body-shamers directly, saying, "Though you've never seen my body, you still judge it and judge me for it.
